text: Does anyone have any experience connecting to Dell Boomi? We are trying to connect a HubSpot org via Dell Boomi and am running into some errors. Iâ€™m happy to send over what we are using to authenticate but wanted to see if anyone has had experience getting the systems connected. Thanks!
